Package com.stuypulse.stuylib.control.angle

Class AngleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.stuypulse.stuylib.control.angle.AngleController
  • public class AngleController
extends java.lang.Object
    A continuous controller whose measurements and setpoints will be angles.

    An angle controller handles continuous systems that are (most often) measured on a circle, which means the error must be normalized into the range [-180, +180].

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AngleController​(Controller controller)
      Creates an angle controller from a controller.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AngleController

        public AngleController​(Controller controller)
        Creates an angle controller from a controller.

        The controller should be configured BEFORE being passed into the angle controller. Then .angle() should be called to create

        BY DEFAULT, this controller should expect to receive error in the unit of radians.

        Parameters:
        controller - controller to wrap
